name: Apple AirPods Max
title: Apple AirPods Max Over-Ear Headphones
long_details: The Apple AirPods Max offers high-fidelity audio with active noise cancellation, spatial audio, and a custom-designed chip for an immersive sound experience. Features include a breathable knit mesh canopy and memory foam ear cushions for comfort, and a 20-hour battery life.

name: Beats Studio3 Wireless
title: Beats Studio3 Wireless Over-Ear Headphones
long_details: The Beats Studio3 Wireless headphones feature Pure Adaptive Noise Cancelling (Pure ANC) to block outside noise, providing an immersive listening experience. Equipped with Apple's W1 chip, they offer easy pairing with Apple devices and up to 22 hours of battery life.

name: Bose QuietComfort 45
title: Bose QuietComfort 45 Noise Cancelling Headphones
long_details: Bose QuietComfort 45 headphones deliver superior noise cancellation for an immersive sound experience. With a lightweight design, comfortable earcups, and up to 24 hours of battery life, they are perfect for travel, work, or long listening sessions.

name: Sony WH-1000XM5
title: Sony WH-1000XM5 Wireless Noise Cancelling Headphones
long_details: The Sony WH-1000XM5 features next-generation noise-canceling technology and superior sound quality. With adaptive sound control, touch-sensitive controls, and up to 30 hours of battery life, these headphones are perfect for travel and everyday use.

name: Sennheiser Momentum 4
title: Sennheiser Momentum 4 Wireless Over-Ear Headphones
long_details: Sennheiser's Momentum 4 headphones offer premium sound with adaptive noise cancellation and a 60-hour battery life. With a lightweight, comfortable design, they deliver powerful, balanced audio for all types of music and media.

name: JBL Club 950NC
title: JBL Club 950NC Noise Cancelling Over-Ear Headphones
long_details: JBL Club 950NC headphones are designed for audiophiles, offering powerful bass and excellent sound quality. With adaptive noise cancellation, touch controls, and a 55-hour battery life, they are ideal for everyday listening.

name: Bang & Olufsen Beoplay HX
title: Bang & Olufsen Beoplay HX Noise Cancelling Headphones
long_details: The Beoplay HX offers superior sound quality with advanced noise cancellation. Crafted with high-quality materials, these headphones provide up to 35 hours of battery life, a luxurious feel, and exceptional sound performance.

name: Master & Dynamic MW75
title: Master & Dynamic MW75 Active Noise Cancelling Headphones
long_details: The MW75 delivers high-quality sound with active noise cancellation, offering rich audio and superior comfort. With a sleek design, premium materials, and 28 hours of battery life, these headphones offer both style and performance.

name: AirPods Pro 2nd Gen
title: Apple AirPods Pro (2nd Generation)
long_details: The AirPods Pro 2nd Gen delivers superior sound quality with Active Noise Cancellation and Transparency mode. Featuring Apple's H2 chip, longer battery life, and a more comfortable in-ear fit, they offer an upgraded listening experience.

name: Beats Fit Pro
title: Beats Fit Pro True Wireless Earbuds
long_details: Beats Fit Pro offers premium sound, active noise cancellation, and a secure, comfortable fit. With Apple's H1 chip, spatial audio, and up to 6 hours of listening time, they are perfect for workouts and everyday activities.

name: Sony WF-1000XM4
title: Sony WF-1000XM4 True Wireless Earbuds
long_details: Sony WF-1000XM4 offers industry-leading noise cancellation and superior sound quality with LDAC support. These compact earbuds feature IPX4 water resistance, touch controls, and up to 8 hours of playback on a single charge.

name: Jabra Elite 85t
title: Jabra Elite 85t True Wireless Earbuds
long_details: Jabra Elite 85t features adjustable active noise cancellation and excellent sound quality with custom EQ. With a comfortable fit, IPX4 water resistance, and up to 25 hours of battery life with the charging case, they are ideal for all-day use.

name: Sennheiser Momentum True Wireless 3
title: Sennheiser Momentum True Wireless 3 Earbuds
long_details: Sennheiser Momentum True Wireless 3 delivers superior sound with active noise cancellation and a long-lasting battery. These premium earbuds provide exceptional clarity and a customizable fit, making them perfect for audiophiles on the go.

name: Bose QuietComfort Earbuds II
title: Bose QuietComfort Earbuds II
long_details: The Bose QuietComfort Earbuds II provide unmatched noise cancellation and high-quality sound. They feature a secure fit with three sizes of silicone tips, an IPX4 water resistance rating, and up to 6 hours of listening time.

name: JBL Live Pro 2
title: JBL Live Pro 2 TWS Earbuds
long_details: The JBL Live Pro 2 features JBLâ€™s signature sound with active noise cancellation, a secure in-ear fit, and 40 hours of battery life. These earbuds are designed for immersive sound during workouts, commuting, or casual listening.

name: Samsung Galaxy Buds Pro
title: Samsung Galaxy Buds Pro
long_details: Samsung Galaxy Buds Pro deliver premium sound with active noise cancellation and a comfortable fit. With IPX7 water resistance, ambient sound mode, and 5 hours of battery life, they are perfect for a variety of activities.

name: Master & Dynamic MW08
title: Master & Dynamic MW08 Active Noise Cancelling Earbuds
long_details: The MW08 earbuds deliver immersive sound with active noise cancellation and up to 12 hours of listening time. Crafted from ceramic and stainless steel, they provide a luxurious feel and a premium audio experience.
